name: it's like pong BUT
description:
It's a pong clone BUT three random gameplay modifiers are added to each match.

Sometimes it produces fun and fair games. Sometimes the result is just a messy (but hopefully hilarious) thing.

Instructions.-

Player 1, W and S.

Player 2, Arrow keys.

Space takes you back to the menu. F toggles fullscreen. Escape closes the game.

On some browsers using the arrow keys will scroll the page, make sure to play on fullscreen or download the game instead when playing with a friend.

Dev rambling.-

The game has a list of 30 modifiers to choose from and it's fully random, meaning some of them might appear on consecutive matches.

Some combinations might not work as intended, it's hard to take into account all the combinations.

This was originally made for a showcase that didn't pick the game. Have this at your event and force me to add more modifiers.

1 player mode is just a demo. It's hard to make a decent AI that will react to every modifier combination.
